game.name: Viscera Cleanup Detail
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In Viscera Cleanup Detail, you step into the boots of a space-station janitor tasked with cleaning up after various horrific sci-fi horror events. Instead of machineguns and plasma-rifles, your tools are a mop and bucket. That hero left a mess, and it's up to you to deal with the aftermath.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Viscera Cleanup Detail, you step into the boots of a space-station janitor tasked with cleaning up after various horrific sci-fi horror events. Instead of machineguns and plasma-rifles, your tools are a mop and bucket. That hero left a mess, and it's up to you to deal with the aftermath.

reviewHighlights.text: 무슨 캐릭터가 어깨빵 했다고 쳐 뒤지노
